get_annotation_triples

Source: R/queries.R
get_annotation_triples.Rd

get_annotation_triples

get_annotation_triples(compendium = "vespucci", ids = NULL)

Arguments

compendium

A string - the selected compendium
ids

A string - unique id of a biofeature, a sample, etc.

Value

A matrix with 3 columns

Examples

get_annotation_triples(ids = "U2FtcGxlVHlwZTozMjAw")
#>       [,1]                                [,2]                           
#>  [1,] "Na40b86b0d5674343a220a9232de33222" "type"                         
#>  [2,] "Na40b86b0d5674343a220a9232de33222" "Duration"                     
#>  [3,] "Nc274a0c72ad449b7bed4d1c26fe82c0f" "value"                        
#>  [4,] "UO_0000032"                        "name"                         
#>  [5,] "Nc274a0c72ad449b7bed4d1c26fe82c0f" "unit"                         
#>  [6,] "GSM2627902.ch1"                    "whole plant development stage"
#>  [7,] "GSM2627902.ch1"                    "whole plant development stage"
#>  [8,] "GSM2627902.ch1"                    "cultivar"                     
#>  [9,] "NCBITaxon_29760"                   "name"                         
#> [10,] "GSM2627902.ch1"                    "Genotype"

#> [28,] "degree"                           
#> [29,] "UO_0000185"                       
#> [30,] "Nd549454f14a444709974bb6d5babc550"

#> [33,] "-480.0"                           
#> [34,] "hour"                             
#> [35,] "UO_0000032"                       
my_ids <- get_biofeature_id(name_In = c("VIT_00s0332g00160","VIT_00s0396g00010"
,"VIT_00s0505g00030"))$id
get_annotation_triples(ids = my_ids)
#>       [,1]                [,2]         [,3]               
#>  [1,] "VIT_00s0332g00160" "Gene Alias" "1.6.5.3"          
#>  [2,] "VIT_00s0332g00160" "Gene Alias" "EC:1.6.5.3"       
#>  [3,] "VIT_00s0332g00160" "Gene Alias" "1.6.99.3"         
#>  [4,] "VIT_00s0332g00160" "Gene Alias" "EC:1.6.99.3"      
#>  [5,] "VIT_00s0332g00160" "Gene Alias" "VIT_00s0332g00160"
#>  [6,] "VIT_00s0332g00160" "Gene Alias" "Vv00s0332g00160"  
#>  [7,] "VIT_00s0396g00010" "Gene Alias" "Vv00s0396g00010"  
#>  [8,] "VIT_00s0505g00030" "Gene Alias" "1.6.5.3"          
#>  [9,] "VIT_00s0505g00030" "Gene Alias" "EC:1.6.5.3"       
#> [10,] "VIT_00s0505g00030" "Gene Alias" "VIT_00s0505g00030"
#> [11,] "VIT_00s0505g00030" "Gene Alias" "Vv00s0505g00030"
